answers.answer: Watch your salt intake. It could also be a sign of preeclampsia. Ask your doctor
I really don't put salt on anything that's already cooked. When I'm cooking I don't even put salt in I just put the regular seasonings.. & I drink a lot of water .but I go to the Dr tm .

question: So I'm 17 weeks& 3 days & I've noticed my feet & ankles swelling .. I really don't do much at all. Is this normal for this to happen at this time?
title: question
